hero.title: Custom Hydraulic Cylinder Manufacturing
hero.subtitle: Precision manufacturing of bespoke hydraulic components and complete cylinder assemblies

overview.title: Bespoke Hydraulic Component Manufacturing
overview.subtitle: Custom cylinders, pistons, rods and gland caps manufactured to your exact specifications
content: Custom hydraulic cylinder manufacturing involves the complete design and production of bespoke hydraulic components tailored to specific application requirements. At Dynasurf, we specialise in manufacturing hydraulic cylinders, pistons, rods, gland caps, and sealing systems that meet unique operational demands where standard components simply won't suffice.

Our manufacturing capabilities extend from single prototypes to production runs, covering everything from heavy-duty industrial cylinders to precision pneumatic actuators. With over 50 years of engineering expertise, we understand that each application has unique pressure, stroke, mounting, and environmental requirements that demand custom solutions.

We maintain extensive material stocks including various grades of steel, stainless steel, bronze, and specialist alloys, enabling us to offer same-day manufacturing for urgent requirements. Our CNC machining centres and skilled craftsmen ensure every component meets or exceeds OEM specifications.

capabilities.title: Manufacturing Capabilities & Specifications
capabilities.content: Dynasurf's manufacturing facility is equipped with state-of-the-art CNC machinery and precision measurement equipment. Our capabilities include:

specs.label: Cylinder Bore Sizes
specs.description: From 25mm to 300mm diameter with honing capabilities

specs.label: Rod Diameters
specs.description: 12mm to 200mm with precision grinding and chrome plating

specs.label: Stroke Lengths
specs.description: Up to 2.2 meters with custom mounting arrangements

specs.label: Operating Pressures
specs.description: Standard up to 350 bar, high-pressure systems to 700 bar

specs.label: Materials
specs.description: EN24, EN8, stainless steel 316/304, bronze, and specialist alloys

specs.label: Surface Treatments
specs.description: Hard chrome plating, nitriding, anodising, and protective coatings

capabilities.additional_content: We design cylinders for single-acting, double-acting, telescopic, and multi-stage operations, incorporating advanced sealing systems and precision bearings for extended service life and reliable performance.

process.title: Design & Manufacturing Process
process.subtitle: From concept to completion - engineered for performance

steps.title: Application Analysis
steps.description: Detailed analysis of operating conditions, mounting requirements, environmental factors, and performance specifications

steps.title: Design & CAD
steps.description: 3D CAD design with stress analysis, material selection, and optimisation for performance and manufacturability

steps.title: Precision Manufacturing
steps.description: CNC machining, honing, grinding, and surface treatment using the latest equipment and quality control

steps.title: Assembly & Testing
steps.description: Professional assembly with pressure testing, stroke testing, and final inspection before delivery

components.title: Custom Component Manufacturing
components.content: Beyond complete cylinder assemblies, we manufacture individual components to the highest standards:

types.title: Hydraulic Pistons
types.description: Custom pistons with integral sealing or separate seal grooves, optimised for your application

types.title: Cylinder Rods
types.description: Precision ground and chrome plated rods with custom end fittings and mounting arrangements

types.title: Gland Caps & Bodies
types.description: Machined from solid billets with precision seal grooves and bearing surfaces

types.title: Custom Fittings
types.description: Bespoke mounting brackets, clevises, and connection hardware for unique installations

applications.title: Custom Manufacturing Applications
applications.content: Our bespoke manufacturing services support unique requirements across multiple industries:

sectors.title: Construction & Earthmoving
sectors.description: Replacement cylinders for obsolete machinery, heavy-duty applications, marine construction

sectors.title: Industrial Automation
sectors.description: Special-purpose cylinders for production lines, robotics, and material handling systems

sectors.title: Marine & Offshore
sectors.description: Corrosion-resistant cylinders for harsh environments, deck machinery, and subsea applications

sectors.title: Specialist Vehicles
sectors.description: Custom cylinders for emergency vehicles, military applications, and specialist transport

applications.additional_content: Each custom cylinder is engineered for specific operational requirements including environmental conditions, duty cycle, and maintenance accessibility.

faqs.question: Can you manufacture cylinders to replace obsolete components?
faqs.answer: Yes, we specialise in reverse-engineering obsolete hydraulic cylinders where original manufacturers no longer support the equipment. We can often improve on the original design while maintaining mounting compatibility, providing better performance and longer service life.

faqs.question: What's the typical lead time for custom manufacturing?
faqs.answer: Lead times vary depending on complexity and current workload. Simple cylinders with materials in stock can often be completed same-day or next-day. Complex custom designs typically take 5-10 working days. We'll provide accurate timelines with your quote and can expedite urgent requirements.

faqs.question: Do you provide technical design support?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Our engineers can assist with application analysis, material selection, mounting design, and performance optimisation. We use 3D CAD systems and can provide detailed drawings and stress analysis to ensure optimal performance for your specific application.

faqs.question: Can you manufacture high-pressure cylinders?
faqs.answer: Yes, we regularly manufacture cylinders for operating pressures up to 700 bar. High-pressure cylinders require special attention to material selection, seal design, and safety factors. We design and test all high-pressure systems to appropriate safety standards with full certification.

faqs.question: What materials and surface treatments are available?
faqs.answer: We work with various steel grades including EN24, EN8, stainless steel 316/304, and specialist alloys. Surface treatments include hard chrome plating, nitriding, anodising, and protective coatings. Material selection depends on your operating environment, pressure requirements, and compatibility needs.

faqs.question: Do you offer warranty on custom manufactured cylinders?
faqs.answer: Yes, all custom manufactured cylinders come with a 12-month warranty covering materials, workmanship, and performance. This includes all seals, surface treatments, and assembly work. We stand behind our manufacturing quality and provide ongoing technical support throughout the product lifecycle.
